EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear David, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information form Sapient. I understand they wanted to provide you with the option of using our program. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services, provide you with an estimate, and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8yg5KH%2D6Bb4hS8%2DNYGWG1VTr2jO%5FZYIAIZL13gZEn%2DrCxymFYh%2Dmrx1rkJ1Y3En1nVDKecZEYnCneB5wwXjS2o1blNp8ahiMQv5kPwr%2DxTOGOyCPwz07O5xm5HUlT%5FviP0HiVXaBenMAv7Wcpx2QtLMzC4C3p%2DqQoqiti4dxPoxZtpKl5GvxK9CqEBzPa3KWoTeVYW7arxejw7qxxbE0BgoQkKkDgIgO0Oq2%2DYCZWpB%2DPmBg%5FAwNmKglDK98tuiKVvykOcO9cSnC1uwsX%5FVcDxZJui9nRkHLMNT6seQ%2C%2C/1gwVMIfFNB5UrAli4vGcJrvkiTDSNJuntvMlOtvf4ZAz0lxBZuPEZRP3vfJ6JpgRZt%2DwLRE1H5kkki5oKcy%2DK8US3PpXOXmaXG7yiLWfPatkNOZR%5Ftdw0r2O7lUWs%5FS3tXXNBXoJBSJIIVW5>.
